title: Oil Steady With Focus on Geopolitical Risk Before Iran Talks
description: Oil was little changed at the start of the week, as traders monitored geopolitical risk before talks between the US and Iran are expected to resume on Tuesday.
content: Oil was little changed at the start of the week, as traders monitored geopolitical risk before talks between the US and Iran are expected to resume on Tuesday.
